Text.Page:
I lost a lot of brave vanguards out here. The wendigos slaughtered them, probably thanks to that wicked argon glass thingâ€”the pylon?

At any rate, I can't recover their effects so long as the wendigos patrol the area.

I need you to take them out. It's going to be a long fight, but you can do it.

I don't care if the wendigos are Thulsa's thralls or not. They killed my people and stood in our way of dealing with the god of death. They had to go.

I appreciate your help. The condolence letters are easier to write if I have something to send with it.
